ARABIC: وَجَآءَتْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ مَّعَهَا سَآئِقٌ وَشَهِيدٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Every self will come together with a driver and a witness:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Each soul will come with a driver and a witness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Everyone has come, each attended by one who will drive him on, and another who will bear witness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Every soul will be accompanied (by an angel) behind him and another as a witness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And every soul came, along with a herder and a witness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And every person will come forth along with a Sa'iq and a Shahid.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And every soul shall come, with it a driver and a witness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And every soul shall come, and with it a driver and a witness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And every soul cometh, along with it a driver and a witness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Each person will arrive attended by an [angel] to drive him on and another to bear witness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And there shall come every soul therewith shall be a driver and a witness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Every soul will come accompanied by [two angels], a driver, and a witness:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And there will come forth every soul: with each will be an (angel) to drive, and an (angel) to bear witness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And every person will come forth along with an (angel) to drive (him), and an (angel) to bear witness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Each soul shall come with a driver, and a witness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And every soul will come forward, accompanied by a driver and a witness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And every soul will come, with it a driver and a witness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [50:21] And, thereat, every soul will come, to the site for the Gathering, accompanied by a driver, an angel to drive it there, and a witness, to testify to its deeds, namely, the hands and the feet and others; and it will be said to the disbeliever:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And every soul cometh, along with it a driver) leading it to its Lord; this driver is the angel who recorded the evil deeds it had committed (and a witness) before its Lord; this is the angels who recorded its good deeds; and it is also said that this witness is man's works. 606
